title: Greatest FIFA shot of all time. What is this years shot.

author: jkman61494
text: A crying Neymar taking a second to appreciate one of the Croatia players kids going to say hi to him amidst his heartbreak. Really touching moment IMO

author: Creative_Armadillo37
text: He was about to bite the kid for sure

author: detectorofmorons
text: The fuck? Go suarez somewhere else

author: Creative_Armadillo37
text: Oh I mixed up south american crybabies
